title: Baby and the bottle
creator_contributor_role: Cambridge FIlm T V Productions, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Care and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Infants - Care and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Infants - Nutrition
description: This film describes and demonstrates the bottle feeding of a baby. It points out important details which must be observed to ensure satisfactory feeding and demonstrates preparation and sterilization methods, including terminal sterilization whereby several bottles can be prepared and stored for future use.
